item.title: Pothole outside Plumstead Pantry caused damage to car, 12th January
item.description:
I drove over this pothole outside Plumstead Pantry / The Old Mill pub last night and the noise from the collision was so loud I had to stop the car. Fortunately I live very nearby so I slowly limped the car home but there's a clear clunking/popping/grinding noise coming from the front left wheel when I turn the car now so something is broken.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Warwick Terrace, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Landscape team please take care of this small gardens, 11th January
item.description:
The 2 small landscape gardens which are between 23 Kelly Avenue and 25 Kelly Avenue SE15 5GL are being neglected by council landscape team. Please clean these 2 small gardens and please keep them taking care of. These 2 small gardens don't belong to any flat or house. It must be taking care of by council.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, Watts Street, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
